description: Test code for the Resolver class, which loads a JSON overlay for device configurations and verifies alias resolution and event support.

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: A class responsible for loading device configuration overlays and resolving device aliases, as well as checking event support.

methods.name: int main()
methods.description: Entry point of the test program, which writes a JSON overlay to a temporary file, loads it into the Resolver, and performs assertions to verify correct behavior.
